conbody.p: Eucalyptus Auto Scaling automatically adds and removes instances based on demand. Auto scaling can scale dynamically based on metrics (for example, CPU utilization), or it can scale based on a schedule. The Auto Scaling service works in conjunction with elastic load balancing and CloudWatch services.

The following section describes how Auto Scaling works, provides an overview of Auto Scaling concepts, and includes a series of usage scenarios that will show you how to perform common Auto Scaling tasks.
